Very fun game, do NOT let the graphics decieve you.Here, I'll list the pros and cons of the game:

PROS:
1.People dont talk much,so not much of a risk of being called "♥♥♥♥♥♥" or any of that ♥♥♥♥.
2.Better than COD
3.Cheap!
4.Fun gameplay with a large assortment of weapons

CONS:
1.For some reason,it lags for me.I have no idea why.
2.Graphics are bad (But no one cares! :D)
3.Not many people actually PLAY the game.

So please,EVERYONE PLAY THIS!ITS FUN!

I recently just started playing this game after it sat in my library, unplayed. What I found, made me happy I decided to play it. While old, this game is a blast. It may not have a ton of players, but what is there can be a blast. Half Life's masterfully designed gunplay fits perfectly into this chaotic pvp environment. Just messing around with the large pool of weapons is all you really need to have a good time in this game.

Play as your favorite Gordon Freeman

PROS: The game controls just as smoothly as the original Half-Life.  Everything that was good about the gun feel and gameplay is right here.

CONS: It's just an online shooter, really lacking any of the polish or finesse that the other games spawned off this engine grew into.  There's also a bit of a shortage of content compared to them as well.  Last...let's not mince words, the game is mostly dead at this point.

FINAL: Nothing really to say beyond the short description.  Maybe if I got into this ages ago, I could really dive deep.  But right now, not quite worth the time.
